recipe_metadata.title: AI Agent Integration (Master Recipe)
recipe_metadata.description: This is a master recipe that orchestrates the integration of various AI agent tools and services. It is composed of multiple, modular sub-recipes, each handling a specific tool.

recipe_overview.description: Integrate powerful AI development and content creation tools (RA.Aid, Browser-Use, ArchiveBox, Aider, Ollama) as modular, self-contained components that can be safely installed/uninstalled without breaking the system.

execution_plan: Execute sub-recipes in the order listed in the `sub_recipes` array.
Refer to the `README.json` in the `modules/` directory for details on each sub-recipe.
